meta.DO_NOT_DELETE_FEATURES: This inventory is APPEND-ONLY. Mark features as passing/failing, add new features, but NEVER DELETE FEATURES FROM THIS FILE. Deletion corrupts project history.

features.description: Project bootstrapped (Next.js + TypeScript + Tailwind + Supabase wiring)
Email verification + password auth with secure sessions (iron-session), lockout, and role routing
features.verification: Run: npm test. Manual smoke: signup → verify → create password → login → logout → reset password

features.description: Student journal/attendance flows per classroom (Toronto timezone rules), plus student dashboards
features.verification: Run: npm test. Manual smoke: student submits entry for today and sees history update

features.description: Teacher attendance matrix, entry drill-down, class day management, and CSV export
features.verification: Run: npm test. Manual smoke: teacher views classroom attendance and exports CSV

features.description: Classroom CRUD, join codes/links, enrollments, roster CSV upload, and per-classroom class days
features.verification: Run: npm test. Manual smoke: teacher creates classroom and uploads roster; student joins by code

features.description: Assignments per classroom with student editor (autosave + submit/unsubmit + late detection) and teacher read-only views
features.verification: Run: npm test. Manual smoke: student edits + submits; teacher views submission status

features.description: Expand coverage, harden security, and keep docs in sync (coverage thresholds met and stable)
features.verification: Run: npm run test:coverage (and meet thresholds). Add missing tests as needed.

features.description: AI continuity layer (.ai/) and standardized protocols
features.verification: Run: bash scripts/verify-env.sh and node scripts/features.mjs validate.

features.description: Teacher-facing 1-line daily log summaries per student/day (cheap model; separate from assignment summaries)
features.verification: Manual smoke: teacher opens Logs view for a date and sees 1-line summaries for students with logs; verify model is OpenAI gpt-5-nano and summaries are cached unless entry text changes.
